channel.title: cold on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in cold on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 1.15: Rise and Fall
item.description: 22nd April, 2011 Janani’s log; Solar date: 220411.12 Last week I had crammed too many activities into my schedule; attending multiple classes, working on the programming, in aerobics, music group and a Greenpeace meeting.

item.title: Home Remedies from south India: Coughs
item.description: This is the third post in the series which started with Hair Care. The second of which was on Colds. The information in this series is the knowledge of my grandmother, which I documented as part of a project on medicinal plants and home remedies.

item.title: Home Remedies from south India: Colds
item.description: This is a continuation of the series which started with Hair Care. The information in this series is the knowledge of my grandmother, which I documented as part of a project on medicinal plants and home remedies.

item.title: Prologue
item.description: Where are you? Iâ€™m here, waiting. Full moon waned to half. You watch me wait, Cruelly test my endurance. The sun rises and sets. I could watch it all alone And know you’re there Watching with me in spirit From the hilltop.

item.title: The Shadow
item.description: Black and white, day and night. Contrasts. There can only be one when the other exists. So it is not all that strange that a bright light casts an intense shadow.
